com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

接口 Keyboard


  • public interface Keyboard
    Cloud keyboard interaction APIs

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void checkCapsLock(AsyncCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
      Query the letter case of the cloud keyboard.
      void onKey(int keycode, boolean down)
      Trigger a key event of the cloud keyboard.
      void reset()
      Reset the key status of the cloud keyboard.
      void resetCapsLock()
      Reset the letter case of the cloud keyboard.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onKey

        void onKey(int keycode,
           boolean down)
        Trigger a key event of the cloud keyboard.
        参数:
        keycode - The keycode
        down - Valid values: `true`: Press; `false`: Release.

      • checkCapsLock

        void checkCapsLock(AsyncCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Query the letter case of the cloud keyboard.
        参数:
        callback - The callback for the letter case

      • resetCapsLock

        void resetCapsLock()
        Reset the letter case of the cloud keyboard. Reset the letter case to lowercase.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the key status of the cloud keyboard. This API is used to release all keys when there are stuck keys on the keyboard.
